questions.question: What is a graph?
answers: A collection of nodes and edges
A collection of elements in a linear order
A tree with at most two children
A structure with only one root
questions.correctAnswer: A collection of nodes and edges

questions.question: What distinguishes a directed graph from an undirected graph?
answers: Nodes have at most two children

questions.question: Which algorithm is used for finding the shortest path in a weighted graph?
What is the degree of a node in an undirected graph?
answers: The number of edges incident to the node
The number of children the node has
The number of nodes in the graph
questions.correctAnswer: The number of edges incident to the node

questions.question: Which traversal method visits all the vertices of a graph starting from a given vertex?
